name: Ryu Hiroyama
projectDescUfv: Chrome extension enabling university students quick access to course outlines.
expKeyListPlay&co: Developed automated scripts that fetch ~40,000 monthly records of search performance data and site behavior analytics using the Google Search Console API and Google Analytics API, streamlining data collection and improving visibility.
Built a Google Sheets interface to retrieve CSV uploads containing guest data from hostel managers, appending them to specified sheets and directories, reducing employee documentation time.
Implemented an automated weekly meeting document generator and a Slack notification bot, minimizing preparation time and ensuring automatic weekly notifications to employees.
Built a Google Sheets housekeeping tracking tool to assist hostel receptionists and cleaning staff in monitoring cleaned rooms.
Performed front desk and cleaning duties on-site.
expKeyListUfv: Personal Project: UFV Course Outline Finder (Chrome Extension)

mainText.intro2Part2: in Tokyo at a company that manages hotels, hostels, and saunas, mostly working with
